location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 6 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire Residency to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of a communication (No 1396 of 1824) concerning the Sharga [Sharjah] 'piratical boat', which is currently residing in Mutra [Maṭraḥ] harbour. It notes the Bombay Government's instructions that the boat is to be permitted to put to sea; Sa‘īd bin Sultān Āl Sa‘īd, the Imam of Muscat, has been informed of this decision.
